page.title: 18Spring Farm Vineyard.
page.content: General Information:- apart from the {vineyard}Mr Rees has sheep and pigs which he sells for meat and poultry for his own consumption. This has enabled him to experiment with the vineyard and still have a reliable income from{farming. As yet Mr Rees has no major outlets and sells mainly to restaurants in the West Country, and also to{visitors}who come to look around the vineyard and have a meal. The beginning of the growing year is the end of October and as the vines dieback for the winter, they are pruned individually. the last of the 9000 vines are finished by April and a weedkiller is put down. The vineyard is less busy in May as the vines start growing,and they then have to be {sprayed}with zinc and sulphur every 10 days until late October early November
